content:
Sure, here is a list of the next 75 international film festivals, not including any in the US:

1. Cannes Film Festival (France)
2. Berlin International Film Festival (Germany)
3. Venice Film Festival (Italy)
4. BFI London Film Festival (UK)
5. Rotterdam International Film Festival (Netherlands)
6. San Sebastián International Film Festival (Spain)
7. Hong Kong International Film Festival (China)
8. Busan International Film Festival (South Korea)
9. Locarno International Film Festival (Switzerland)
10. Sydney Film Festival (Australia)
11. Moscow International Film Festival (Russia)
12. Shanghai International Film Festival (China)
13. Dubai International Film Festival (United Arab Emirates)
14. Karlovy Vary International Film Festival (Czech Republic)
15. Jerusalem Film Festival (Israel)
16. Vienna International Film Festival (Austria)
17. Sarajevo Film Festival (Bosnia and Herzegovina)
18. Marrakech International Film Festival (Morocco)
19. Clermont-Ferrand International Short Film Festival (France)
20. Taipei Golden Horse Film Festival (Taiwan)
21. International Film Festival Rotterdam (Netherlands)
22. Shanghai International Film Festival (China)
23. Tokyo International Film Festival (Japan)
24. International Film Festival of India (India)
25. Festival de Cannes (France)
26. International Film Festival of Marrakech (Morocco)
27. International Film Festival of Kerala (India)
28. International Documentary Film Festival Amsterdam (Netherlands)
29. International Film Festival of Mumbai (India)
30. International Short Film Festival Oberhausen (Germany)
31. International Film Festival of Gijón (Spain)
32. International Short Film Festival in Drama (Greece)
33. International Short Film Festival in Uppsala (Sweden)
34. International Short Film Festival in Tampere (Finland)
35. International Film Festival in Istanbul (Turkey)
36. International Short Film Festival in Leuven (Belgium)
37. International Short Film Festival in São Paulo (Brazil)
38. International Short Film Festival in Tirana (Albania)
39. International Film Festival of Morelia (Mexico)
40. International Film Festival of Huesca (Spain)
41. International Short Film Festival in Hamburg (Germany)
42. International Short Film Festival in Bratislava (Slovakia)
43. International Film Festival of Goa (India)
44. International Film Festival of Fribourg (Switzerland)
45. International Film Festival of Namur (Belgium)
46. International Short Film Festival in Tampere (Finland)
47. International Short Film Festival in Uppsala (Sweden)
48. International Short Film Festival in Leuven (Belgium)
49. International Short Film Festival in São Paulo (Brazil)
